unnormalised: Arrey yaar, India lost to Aus by 7 wickets! Kohli only scored 34, what to do? Maybe next time, we'll win by 10 wickets, with Rohit Sharma hitting a century!
normalised: Arrey yaar, India lost to Australia by seven wickets! Kohli only scored thirty four, what to do? Maybe next time, we'll win by ten wickets, with Rohit Sharma hitting a century!
